reviews.review:
É um dos melhores jogos de FPS que eu já joguei, com o estilo cartunesco que é a marca registrada desse título da Valve. Se você gosta de FPS que mistura uma onda de classes diferentes pra jogar, TF2 não pode faltar.

the best fps game i've played in a long time, amazing fan base, pretty good content 9/10 would recomend
best and most favorite game i have ever played

Один из самых типичных шутеров, да может когда он вышел он был классный , но щас в это не очень классно играть (и не за графики) просто игра очень быстро заёбавает( может и мм там  интересный ) но что бы открыть тебе мм, тебе блять надо терпеть супер скучные игры , также обидно что новых персов нет добавляет, да и донат ещё тут чутка решает ( ну или до конца не понял) короче не знаю как вам но я 4 часа своей жизни точно проебал.
maldito juego todo lleno de bots, como lo amo carajo
Yine küllerinden doğuyor ve geri dönüyor.

Игрушка норм была, пока не наступил 2020 год.
Щас там только тупые боты, раки играют и недошкольники со своим владом хуягой а4. 
Дизлайк бы поставил за тупое комьюнити, читеров, и 15 минутным поиском сервера для каток,
Но, НО поставлю лайк за

1. Отличный геймплей
2. Хорошей обучалка в начале
3. Можно каждый день выводить по 3 предмета в инвентарь
4. Очень часто бывают разные ивенты типо нового года, хелоуина и т.д
5. МЕДИИК
6. Флекс путиса под Русскую шарманку
7. Просто так поставлю лайк за старание разрабов

А вам, удачной игры ; )  и с новым 2021 годом!
amazing fun game BUT I WANT MORE UPDATES

It's been a while since I've played TF2 but this game is one of the best class-based shooters ever made. I've clocked close to 1,000 hours on this game and the only regret was that I spent a lot of time on one server. I'm too busy to sink a lot of hours in, like before but the game still holds a special place in my library.

Simplesmente uma obra anti-temporal. O movimento, o combate, até as mecânicas do Rocket Jump e Sticky Jump são dificeis de aprender mas satisfatória de aprender e usar no jogo. Tudo funciona do jeito certo, claro tem muitos, MUITOS, erros mas é incrivel!

A game that will be stuck in your mind for years, and its perfectly balance.

it's pretty ok I guess, I'm not usually a fan of hat simulators but this is kinda good

I Like that it gives player on the bright side. you can unlock new wepons i would give team fortres 2 100%

The game is really good, and the commuinty servers are so helpful. :)

edit: I've gotten better at the game, and its still really fun! won my first comp, finished my first tour, and the game is still really fun! i can see why it is regarded as one of the best games of all time.

Edit 2: Holy shit have I played this game for that long? 450 hours? This game is a blessing and a curse. The blessing being Demoman and community servers, and the curse being no updates and those that shall not be named. 1 year. I first played this game on a work laptop. playing at 20 fps. And I was happy. No tryhards, no bots, no edgy sniper mains. Just servers full of demomains swordfighting and hoovys giving sanviches. It was nice. after putting some money aside for a good pc, I played TF2. My first thought was that this game is beautiful. PLEASE just go into an empty server and just look around. Mvm is one of the best games mods ever. My favorite moment in any fps game was when i joined a random server and just laughed my ass off with 5 other random people. Demoman is one of,  if not the most versatile classes in the game. from being pipe jesus, to being a knight in shinning armor. Dustbowl will always be my home away from home. my first strange, a polar pullover will be my baby forever. Tf2 is one of the best games of all time. Go play it.
Made sex not enjoyable I do not recommend
Не понравилось. Без интернета не скачивается

芜湖，让我谈tf2的话我只想说他只是生病了而已他需要医生，我希望每个玩TF2的玩家都不要放弃。个人想法：众所周知TF2对新人非常不友好但是越是这样不是更有竞技性娱乐性挑战性吗。
别老认为这是一个死亡的游戏，真正的死亡的游戏开发者的放弃社区的放弃玩家的放弃哪怕是调侃也不彳亍

Despite all the bots and problems this game is facing it is still a fun game to play. It has a decent community and a lot of good people who still play to this day. It may seem like a dead game from the outside, but is very alive when you get into it.

this is honest an amazing game. from my personal experience it got a good community and classic feel to its gameplay, well worth every hour spent
